description:
The Nextcloud Desktop Client is a tool to synchronize files from Nextcloud Server with your computer.

Use the desktop clients to keep your files synchronized between your Nextcloud server and your desktop.
Select one or more directories on your local machine and always have access to your latest files wherever you are.
What's Changed
- [stable-3.16] pin Craft revision to a specific commit by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8194
- [stable-3.16] Bugfix/filesystem remove file not working by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8197
- [stable-3.16] Bugfix/read only windows folders by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8196
- [stable-3.16] revert to QFile::remove to remove single files by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8198
- [stable-3.16] Bugfix/do not crash when propagating changes with move or rename by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8199
- [stable-3.16] fix(assert): remove runtime assert that could crash production builds by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8211
- [stable-3.16] fix(gui): resize sharee search results list dependent on required space by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8214
- [stable-3.16] fix(filesystem): ensure we set a file read-only or read-write on Windows by @backportbot in nextcloud/desktop#8215
Full Changelog: nextcloud/desktop@v3.16.3...v3.16.4
